mapper.select: /* 외주 진행 수정 팝업창 데이터 조회 */ SELECT op.stc_cd as stc_cd, sc.stc_nm as stc_nm, op.osp_cust_yn as osp_cust_yn, op.osp_sply_ymdt as osp_sply_ymdt, op.osp_cust_ymdt as osp_cust_ymdt FROM outsourcing_prograss op LEFT JOIN status_code sc ON op.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd WHERE op.ocd_cd = #{ocdCd} ORDER BY op.osp_sply_ymdt ASC

/* 외주 진행 목록 조회 */ select ocd.ocd_cd as ocd_cd, ocd.ocd_ttl as ocd_ttl, ocd.mbr_cd as mbr_cd, m.mbr_nm as mbr_nm, ocd.ent_cd as ent_cd, e.ent_nm as ent_nm, m2.mbr_nm as mbr_ent_nm, op.stc_cd as stc_cd, sc.stc_nm as stc_nm from outsourcing_contract_details ocd left join member m on ocd.mbr_cd = m.mbr_cd left join enterprise e on ocd.ent_cd = e.ent_cd left join member m2 on e.mbr_cd = m2.mbr_cd left join outsourcing_prograss op on ocd.ocd_cd = op.ocd_cd left join status_code sc on op.stc_cd = sc.stc_cd where ocd.stc_cd = 'SD_APPROVED' and op.osp_sply_ymdt = ( select max(osp_sply_ymdt) from outsourcing_prograss where ocd_cd = ocd.ocd_cd );
